DefaultApplicationSettingsStorage

The default implementation of the ApplicationSettingsStorage protocol. Uses NSUserDefaults under the hood.

  • init()

    Initializes a new instance using NSUserDefaults.standardUserDefaults() as the backing store.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public override init()
  • init(userDefaults:)

    Initializes a new instance using the specified NSUserDefaults object as the backing store.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public override init(userDefaults: NSUserDefaults)

    Parameters

    userDefaults

    The NSUserDefaults instance
  • setValue(_:forSetting:)

    Sets a new value for the specified setting.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func setValue(value: NSObject, forSetting settingName: String)

    Parameters

    value

    The new value for settingName
    settingName

    The name of the setting that will receive value
  • removeValueForSetting(_:)

    Removes the existing value (if any) for the setting with the given name.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func removeValueForSetting(name: String)

    Parameters

    name

    The name of the setting whose value will be removed
